00013 Int_t FileNotOK(Char_t file[]){
00014   ifstream f;
00015   f.open(file);
00016   return f.fail();
00017 }

00020 Int_t
00021 Usage(char *argv[]){
00022 
00023   cout << "\n Usage:" << argv[0] << "[-hxg][-f <runID>][--banana][--error-detector]" << endl;
00024   cout << "\n Description: " << endl;
00025   cout << "\t Make plots for Run <runID>." << endl;
00026   cout << "\n Options:" << endl;
00027   cout << "\t -f <runID> " << endl;
00028   cout << "\t --error-detector  plot error detector histograms" << endl;
00029   cout << "\t --feedback        plot feedback histograms" << endl;
00030   cout << "\t --raw             plot raw histograms" << endl;
00031   cout << "\t --banana          plot kinematics reconstruction for all strips" << endl;
00032   cout << "\t --summary         plot summary" << endl;
00033   cout << "\t --strip <stID>    plot kinematics reconstruction for strip <stID>" << endl;
00034   cout << "\t -g \t launch ghostview" << endl;
00035   cout << "\t -h \t show this help    " << endl;
00036   cout << "\t -x \t show example    " << endl;
00037   cout << endl;
00038   exit(0);
00039 
00040 }

00053 
00054 void ColorSkime(){
00055 
00056     const Int_t NRGBs = 5;
00057     const Int_t NCont = 255;
00058 
00059     Double_t stops[NRGBs] = { 0.00, 0.34, 0.61, 0.84, 1.00 };
00060     Double_t red[NRGBs]   = { 0.00, 0.00, 0.87, 1.00, 0.51 };
00061     Double_t green[NRGBs] = { 0.00, 0.81, 1.00, 0.20, 0.00 };
00062     Double_t blue[NRGBs]  = { 0.51, 1.00, 0.12, 0.00, 0.00 };
00063     //    TColor::CreateGradientColorTable(NRGBs, stops, red, green, blue, NCont);
00064     gStyle->CreateGradientColorTable(NRGBs, stops, red, green, blue, NCont);
00065     gStyle->SetNumberContours(NCont);
00066 
00067 }

00074 // =======================================================================================
00075 //                                    Histogram Checker 
00076 // =======================================================================================
00077 Int_t IsOK(Char_t histname[]){
00078   ofstream logfile;
00079   Int_t OK = Int_t(gDirectory->Get(histname));
00080   if (!OK) logfile << "The histogram : " << histname << " doesn't exist in root file. Ignored." << endl;
00081   return OK;
00082 }

00084 
00085 Int_t 
00086 PlotStrip(TFile * rootfile, TCanvas *CurC, TPostScript * ps, Int_t stID){
00087   cout << "PlotStrip stID=" << stID << endl;
00088 
00089   gStyle->SetOptLogz(0);  gStyle->SetOptStat(11);  gStyle->SetOptFit(0);
00090   gStyle -> SetPalette (1);
00091 
00092   ps->NewPage();
00093   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Kinema");  
00094 
00095   Char_t histname[100];
00096   // banana
00097   sprintf(histname,"t_vs_e_st%d",stID);
00098   if (IsOK(histname)) gDirectory->Get(histname) -> Draw("colz");  CurC->Update();  ps->NewPage();
00099 
00100   // mass_vs_e correlation
00101   sprintf(histname,"mass_vs_e_ecut_st%d",stID);
00102   if (IsOK(histname)) gDirectory->Get(histname) -> Draw("contz"); 
00103   sprintf(histname,"mass_vs_energy_corr_st%d",stID);
00104   if (IsOK(histname)) gDirectory->Get(histname) -> Draw("same");  CurC->Update();    
00105   ps->NewPage();
00106 
00107   // invariant mass
00108   sprintf(histname,"mass_nocut_st%d",stID);
00109   if (IsOK(histname)) gDirectory->Get(histname) -> Draw("");  
00110   sprintf(histname,"mass_yescut_st%d",stID);
00111   if (IsOK(histname)) gDirectory->Get(histname) -> Draw("same");    CurC->Update();    
00112 
00113   return 0;
00114 
00115 }

00118 Int_t 
00119 PlotBanana(TFile * rootfile, TCanvas *CurC, TPostScript * ps){
00120   gStyle->SetOptLogz(0);  gStyle->SetOptStat(11);  gStyle->SetOptFit(0);
00121   gStyle -> SetPalette (1);
00122 
00123   ps->NewPage();
00124   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Kinema");  
00125   
00126   CurC->Divide(4,3);
00127   
00128   Char_t histname[100];
00129   Int_t stID;
00130   for (Int_t det=0; det<N_DETECTORS; det++) {
00131 
00132     for (Int_t st=1; st<=NSTRIP_PER_DETECTOR; st++){
00133       stID=det*NSTRIP_PER_DETECTOR+st;
00134       CurC->cd(st);
00135       sprintf(histname,"t_vs_e_st%d",stID);
00136       if (IsOK(histname)) gDirectory->Get(histname) -> Draw("colz");  CurC->Update();    
00137 
00138     }// end-of-strip loop
00139 
00140     if (det!=N_DETECTORS-1) ps->NewPage();
00141 
00142   }
00143 
00144 
00145   return 0;
00146 }

00278 Int_t
00279 AsymPlot::PlotRaw(TFile * rootfile, TCanvas *CurC, TPostScript * ps){
00280 
00281 
00282   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Raw");  
00283   bunch_dist_raw              = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("bunch_dist_raw");
00284   strip_dist_raw              = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("strip_dist_raw");
00285   tdc_raw                     = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("tdc_raw");
00286   adc_raw                     = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("adc_raw");
00287   tdc_vs_adc_raw              = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("tdc_vs_adc_raw");
00288   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Bunch");  
00289   bunch_dist                 = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("bunch_dist");
00290 
00291   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Kinema");
00292   gStyle->SetOptLogz(1);
00293   bunch_dist_raw->Draw(); 
00294   bunch_dist->Draw("same"); CurC->Update(); ps->NewPage(); 
00295   gStyle->SetOptLogz(0);
00296   strip_dist_raw->Draw(); CurC->Update(); ps->NewPage(); 
00297   tdc_raw->Draw(); CurC->Update(); ps->NewPage(); 
00298   adc_raw->Draw(); CurC->Update(); ps->NewPage(); 
00299   tdc_vs_adc_raw->Draw(); CurC->Update(); ps->NewPage(); 
00300 
00301   CurC->Clear(); CurC->Divide(2,2); 
00302   CurC->cd(1) ; bunch_dist_raw->Draw(); bunch_dist->Draw("same");
00303   CurC->cd(2) ; strip_dist_raw->Draw();
00304   CurC->cd(3) ; tdc_raw->Draw();
00305   CurC->cd(4) ; adc_raw -> Draw(); CurC->Update(); 
00306 
00307   gStyle -> SetPalette (1);  ColorSkime();
00308   ps->NewPage();
00309   CurC->cd(1) ; tdc_vs_adc_raw->Draw(); 
00310   CurC->cd(2) ; tdc_vs_adc_raw->Draw("colz"); 
00311   CurC->cd(3) ; tdc_vs_adc_raw->Draw("lego"); CurC->Update(); 
00312 
00313   return 0;
00314 
00315 }

00318 Int_t 
00319 AsymPlot::PlotErrorDetectorSummary(TFile * rootfile, TCanvas *CurC, TPostScript * ps){
00320 
00321   CurC -> SetGridx();
00322 
00323   ps->NewPage();
00324   CurC->Clear(); CurC->Divide(2,2); 
00325   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("ErrDet");  
00326   CurC->cd(1) ; if (gDirectory->Get("mass_e_correlation_strip")!=0) mass_e_correlation_strip -> Draw(); 
00327   CurC->cd(2) ; if (gDirectory->Get("mass_sigma_vs_strip")!=0) mass_sigma_vs_strip -> Draw(); 
00328   CurC->cd(3) ; if (gDirectory->Get("good_carbon_events_strip")!=0) good_carbon_events_strip -> Draw(); 
00329   CurC->cd(4) ; if (gDirectory->Get("mass_pos_dev_vs_strip")!=0) mass_pos_dev_vs_strip -> Draw(); 
00330   CurC->Update();   ps->NewPage();
00331   
00332   rootfile->cd("Asymmetry");
00333   CurC->cd(1) ; if (gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_x90")!=0) asym_vs_bunch_x90 -> Draw(); 
00334   CurC->cd(2) ; if (gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_x45")!=0) asym_vs_bunch_x45 -> Draw(); 
00335   CurC->cd(3) ; if (gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_y45")!=0) asym_vs_bunch_y45 -> Draw(); 
00336   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("ErrDet");
00337   CurC->cd(4) ; if (gDirectory->Get("spelumi_vs_bunch")!=0) spelumi_vs_bunch -> Draw(); 
00338   CurC->Update(); 
00339 
00340   return 0;
00341 
00342 
00343 }

00346 Int_t 
00347 AsymPlot::PlotErrorDetector(TFile * rootfile, TCanvas *CurC, TPostScript * ps){
00348 
00349   CurC -> SetGridx();   gStyle -> SetPalette (1);
00350   ps->NewPage(); CurC->Clear(); CurC->Divide(1,1); 
00351 
00352   // energy slope
00353   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Kinema");
00354   if (gDirectory->Get("energy_spectrum_all")!=0) {energy_spectrum_all->Draw(); CurC->Update();}
00355 
00356   // bunch detailes 
00357   rootfile->cd("Asymmetry");
00358   gStyle->SetStatStyle(0);
00359   if (gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_x90")!=0) {asym_vs_bunch_x90 -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();}
00360   if (gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_x45")!=0) {asym_vs_bunch_x45 -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();}
00361   if (gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_y45")!=0) {asym_vs_bunch_y45 -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();}
00362 
00363   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("ErrDet");
00364   gStyle->SetOptFit(111);
00365   if (gDirectory->Get("asym_bunch_x90")!=0) {asym_bunch_x90   -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();}
00366   if (gDirectory->Get("asym_bunch_x45")!=0) {asym_bunch_x45   -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();}
00367   if (gDirectory->Get("asym_bunch_y45")!=0) {asym_bunch_y45   -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();}
00368   if (gDirectory->Get("spelumi_vs_bunch")!=0){spelumi_vs_bunch -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();}
00369 
00370   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Bunch");
00371   if (IsOK("bunch_spelumi")) bunch_spelumi -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();
00372   if (IsOK("bunch_dist"))    bunch_dist    -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();
00373   if (IsOK("wall_current_monitor")) wall_current_monitor -> Draw(); CurC -> Update(); ps->NewPage();
00374 
00375   // strip details
00376   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("ErrDet");
00377   if (IsOK("mass_e_correlation_strip")) mass_e_correlation_strip -> Draw(); CurC->Update(); 
00378   if (IsOK("mass_sigma_vs_strip"))      mass_sigma_vs_strip      -> Draw(); CurC->Update(); 
00379   if (IsOK("mass_chi2_vs_strip"))       mass_chi2_vs_strip       -> Draw(); CurC->Update(); 
00380   if (IsOK("good_carbon_events_strip")) good_carbon_events_strip -> Draw(); CurC->Update(); 
00381   if (IsOK("mass_pos_dev_vs_strip"))    mass_pos_dev_vs_strip    -> Draw(); CurC->Update(); 
00382 
00383   // sin(phi) fit
00384   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Asymmetry");
00385   gStyle->SetOptFit(111); gStyle->SetOptStat(0);
00386   if (IsOK("asym_sinphi_fit")) asym_sinphi_fit->Draw(); CurC->Update();
00387 
00388   return 0;
00389 
00390 }

00394 //
00395 // Class name  : AsymPlot
00396 // Method name : GetHistograms(TFile * rootfile)
00397 //
00398 // Description : Get histogram pointers from rootfile
00399 // Input       : TFile * rootfile
00400 // Return      : 
00401 //
00402 Int_t 
00403 AsymPlot::GetHistograms(TFile * rootfile){
00404 
00405   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("ErrDet");  
00406   mass_e_correlation_strip   = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("mass_e_correlation_strip");
00407   mass_sigma_vs_strip        = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("mass_sigma_vs_strip");
00408   mass_chi2_vs_strip         = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("mass_chi2_vs_strip");
00409   good_carbon_events_strip   = (TH1I*)gDirectory->Get("good_carbon_events_strip");
00410   mass_pos_dev_vs_strip      = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("mass_pos_dev_vs_strip");
00411   spelumi_vs_bunch           = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("spelumi_vs_bunch");
00412   bunch_spelumi              = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("bunch_spelumi");
00413   asym_bunch_x90             = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("asym_bunch_x90");
00414   asym_bunch_x45             = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("asym_bunch_x45");
00415   asym_bunch_y45             = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("asym_bunch_y45");
00416 
00417   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Asymmetry");
00418   asym_vs_bunch_x90          = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_x90");
00419   asym_vs_bunch_x45          = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_x45");
00420   asym_vs_bunch_y45          = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("asym_vs_bunch_y45");
00421   asym_sinphi_fit            = (TH2F*)gDirectory->Get("asym_sinphi_fit");
00422 
00423   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Bunch");
00424   bunch_dist                 = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("bunch_dist");
00425   wall_current_monitor       = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("wall_current_monitor");
00426   specific_luminosity        = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("specific_luminosity");
00427 
00428   // energy slope
00429   rootfile->cd(); rootfile->cd("Kinema");
00430   energy_spectrum_all        = (TH1F*)gDirectory->Get("energy_spectrum_all");
00431 
00432 
00433   return 0;
00434 
00435 }

00438 
00439 //
00440 // Class name  : 
00441 // Method name : FindRootFile(TFile * rootfile)
00442 //
00443 // Description : Search for root file in ./root directory. If the root file is not
00444 //             : found in ./root direcotry, then search for current working directory. 
00445 //             : The root file is accessed via symbolic link to the data file. If root
00446 //             : file is found in pwd, then the file is moved to root directry then
00447 //             : symbolic linked.
00448 // Input       : 
00449 // Return      : 
00450 //
00451 void 
00452 FindRootFile(){
00453 
00454   // rootfile operation
00455   Char_t filename[50], text[100];
00456 
00457   // remove existing ./AsymPlot.root 
00458   sprintf(text,"rm -f %s", lnkfile); gSystem->Exec(text); 
00459   if (!RUNID) RUNID="7279.005"; // default
00460 
00461   // First search for ./root directory 
00462   sprintf(filename,"root/%s.root",RUNID);
00463   if (FileNotOK(filename)) {
00464     cout<< filename << " is not found. Search for pwd." << endl;
00465     sprintf(filename,"%s.root",RUNID); // then look for pwd
00466     if (FileNotOK(filename)) { 
00467       cerr << "./" << filename << " is not found neither. Force exit." << endl;
00468       exit(-1);
00469     } else {
00470       sprintf(text,"mv -f %s root/.", filename); gSystem->Exec(text);
00471       sprintf(filename,"root/%s.root",RUNID);
00472     }
00473   }
00474    
00475   // make symbolic link from root/RUNID.root to ./AsymPlot.root
00476   sprintf(text,"ln -s %s %s",filename,lnkfile);
00477   gSystem->Exec(text);
00478 
00479   return;
00480 
00481  }

00484 //#ifndef __CINT__
00485 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00486 
00487   int opt, option_index = 0;
00488   static struct option long_options[] = {
00489     {"strip", 1, 0, 's'},
00490     {"banana", 0, 0, 'b'},
00491     {"feedback", 0, 0, 'F'},
00492     {"raw", 0, 0, 'r'},
00493     {"error-detector", 0, 0, 'e'},
00494     {"summary", 0, 0, 'S'},
00495     {"create", 1, 0, 'c'},
00496     {"file", 1, 0, 0},
00497     {0, 0, 0, 0}
00498   };
00499 
00500   while (EOF != (opt = getopt_long (argc, argv, "gerSFh?xf:s:b:", long_options, &option_index))) {
00501     switch (opt) {
00502     case -1:
00503       break;
00504     case 'b':
00505       PLOT_BANANA=1;
00506       ERROR_DETECTOR=0;
00507       SUMMARY=0;
00508       break;
00509     case 'r':
00510       PLOT_BANANA=0;
00511       ERROR_DETECTOR=0;
00512       SUMMARY=0;
00513       PLOT_RAW=1;
00514       break;
00515     case 'e':
00516       ERROR_DETECTOR=1;
00517       PLOT_BANANA=0;
00518       break;
00519     case 'g':
00520       GHOSTVIEW=1;
00521       break;
00522     case 'f':
00523       RUNID=optarg;
00524       break;
00525     case 'F':
00526       FEEDBACK=1;
00527       SUMMARY=0;
00528       ERROR_DETECTOR=0;
00529       PLOT_BANANA=0;
00530       break;
00531     case 'S':
00532       SUMMARY=1;
00533       ERROR_DETECTOR=0;
00534       PLOT_BANANA=0;
00535       break;
00536     case 's':
00537       stID=atoi(optarg);
00538       break;
00539     case 'h':
00540     case '?':
00541     case '*':
00542       Usage(argv);
00543       break;
00544     }
00545   }
00546 
00547 //#else
00548 //int AsymPlot() {
00549 //#endif
00550 
00551   // load header file
00552   Char_t HEADER[100], text[100], filename[100];
00553   sprintf(HEADER,"%s/AsymHeader.h",gSystem->Getenv("MACRODIR"));
00554   gROOT->LoadMacro(HEADER);
00555 
00556 
00557   // open rootfile 
00558   FindRootFile();
00559   TFile * rootfile = TFile::Open(lnkfile);
00560 
00561 
00562   // Log file handling
00563   ofstream logfile;
00564   logfile.open(".AsymPlot.log");
00565   if (logfile.fail()){ cerr << "Warning: Cannot open .AsymPlot.log." << endl;}
00566 
00567 
00568   // setup color skime
00569   //  ColorSkime();
00570 
00571   // Cambus Setup
00572   TCanvas *CurC = new TCanvas("CurC","",1);
00573 
00574   // postscript file
00575   Char_t psfile[100];
00576   sprintf(psfile,"ps/AsymPlot_%s.ps",RUNID);
00577   TPostScript *ps = new TPostScript(psfile,112);
00578 
00579   AsymPlot asymplot;
00580   asymplot.GetHistograms(rootfile);
00581 
00582   if (stID) PlotStrip(rootfile, CurC, ps, stID);
00583   if (FEEDBACK)     asymplot.PlotFeedback(rootfile, CurC, ps);  // Plot Feedback 
00584   if (PLOT_BANANA)  PlotStrip(rootfile, CurC, ps);   // Plot Individual Strip
00585   if (SUMMARY) asymplot.PlotErrorDetectorSummary(rootfile, CurC, ps);   // Plot Error Detector Summary
00586   if (ERROR_DETECTOR)  asymplot.PlotErrorDetector(rootfile, CurC, ps);   // Plot Error Detector
00587   if (PLOT_RAW) asymplot.PlotRaw(rootfile, CurC, ps);
00588 
00589   // close ps file
00590   cout << "ps file : " << psfile << endl;
00591   ps->Close();
00592 
00593   // close logfile
00594   //  logfile.close();
00595 
00596   // remove symboric link to root file in root directory
00597   sprintf(text,"rm AsymPlot.root ",filename);    
00598   gSystem->Exec(text);  
00599 
00600   sprintf(text,"gv -landscape %s",psfile);
00601   if (GHOSTVIEW) gSystem->Exec(text);
00602 
00603   return 0;
00604 
00605 }
